abstract: Vivian Marino 30-Minute Interview with Michael Kleinberg, president and partner of MKDA, a design firm that specializes in corporate interiors. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kleinberg, 55, is the president and a partner of the design firm MKDA, along with his brother, Jeffrey, and his father, Milo, who founded the firm in 1959. MKDA, originally known as Milo Kleinberg Design Associates, specializes in corporate interiors, and its list of clients has included developers like Silverstein Properties, Vornado Realty Trust and the Durst Organization.
